plot: Documentary on the Chaco War between Bolivia and Paraguay and in particular on the signing of the peace treaty.
title: Infierno Verde o La Guerra del Chaco
plot_es: Documentary on the Chaco War between Bolivia and Paraguay and in particular on the signing of the peace treaty.
original_name: Infierno Verde o La Guerra del Chaco
plot_en: Documentary on the Chaco War between Bolivia and Paraguay and in particular on the signing of the peace treaty.
